result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Review hearing on November 9, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Preliminary Hearing on November 14, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Pre-trial conference on December 13, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Judicial Pretrial - in court on March 6, 2023 at 01:00 pm.

INCLUDES 22CF381, 22CF554 & 22CF772.  Shall not drive a motor vehicle without valid driver's license. Absolute sobriety from, and no possession of controlled substances, except prescriptions taken as prescribed. No driving without a valid license. Prints and photograph. Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release. Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 4 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.

Case Called: 2:45 pm
INCLUDES 22CF381, 22CF554, 22CF772.
Clerk: Kassidi.
State appears by ADA Molly Lawrence in person for ADA Cody Marschall.  Defendant appears in custody (Shawano County Jail), via Zoom Video, pro se.
COURT QUASHES WARRANT.
VRCW.  
Reading Waived. 
Court questions deft re: complaint and rights.
Advised Right of Counsel. 
Prelim Time Limits Preserved.

BOND: 
$500 Signature Bond to cover all files.

CONDITIONS: 
- No driving without valid DL. 
- Other Conditions in other files to cover this bond as well.
- Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release.  Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 4 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.

PTC 12/13 @ 10:00 am

Deft failed to appear at PTC yesterday in 22CF381 & 22CF554. 
COURT makes findings.

BFH set for 8/15/2022 at 9:00 am.
